text: læa banthuk ca thuk wang wi dangnan cea ca hen phu kratha phid thanghlay hwan klaw sing thi mi xyu nı banthuk læa phwk khea ca klaw wa xo khwam wibati khxng rea xey banthuk xari kan ni man midi lawen sing leknxy læa sing hıy to ley wentæ di banthuk wi khrbthwn læa phwk khea di phb sing thi phwk khea di ptibati wi prakt xyu txhna læa phraphupenceakhxng cea mi thrng xthrrm tx phu dı ley
